nl.esciencecenter.octopus.jobs.JobDescription

  • Packages that use JobDescription 
    Package Description
    nl.esciencecenter.octopus.jobs
    This package contains the classes and interfaces used to run jobs.
    nl.esciencecenter.octopus.util
    This package is contains several utility classes that uses the Octopus API.
